title: Patience and its perfect work under sudden & sore tryals
author: Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.
publisher: Printed by S. Simmons, for Rob. Duncomb, to be sold at his shop ...,
notes: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Thomas Goodwin.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
